summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 3, 2019. It includes a count sheet, inmate roster, and official count slips, primarily documenting inmate population counts and administrative procedures. The forms are routine prison operational documents.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, documenting population by housing unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is dated August 3, 2019, which is shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
Shows routine prison administrative procedures including inmate counts and roster maintenance.
Indicates the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York was using standard Bureau of Prisons forms for daily operations.
Document includes multiple administrative forms (count sheet, inmate roster, count slips) from the same date and facility.
